lines.text: These things don't happen in New York! I just hope a guy in a hockey mask named Jason doesn't show up!
Why does that guy in Halloween try and kill Jamie Lee Curtis?... Why do those dumb kids keep going back to Camp Crystal Lake- letting Jason hack and chop them?

[On learning some of his fellow med-students are going to make out]
You're going to have sex?... Don't!... Every time someone has sex in a horror story they get murdered!"

[after someone fondles Mark's backside]
I'm not playing with your butt
You're miles away from anyone. What better place for a group of young interns to come and relax?
No legend is going to scare me off. Just give me some sandpaper and lead me to the nursery!
OK, I'm dead. OK? Alright, you happy now?

[Goading on the killer]
C'mon, kill me!

[confronted by the killer and thinking it's a joke]
Oh, so what are you going to do, kill me?... Just don't mess up my hair, okay?
Guys, I gotta go drain the lizard.
If I were a girl, I'd become a lesbian.

[as she unties Mark's shorts]
I feel like I'm opening a Christmas present.
